team_gold_zork

Class Exit

  • java.lang.Object
    • team_gold_zork.Exit

  • public class Exit
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores all the exits in a Room.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Exit

        public Exit(java.util.Scanner s,
            Dungeon d)
     throws NoExitException
        Constructs an exit by reading a bork file.
        Parameters:
        s - The name of the scanner reading the file.
        d - The name of the dungeon containing the rooms.
        Throws:
        NoExitException - If there are no more exits in the bork file.

      • Exit

        Exit(java.lang.String dir,
     Room src,
     Room dest)
        Creates an exit given its direction and destination.
        Parameters:
        dir - the direction of the exit.
        src - the room containing the exit.
        dest - the room the exit leads to.
